channel.title: Executionable?
channel.description:
Alright. So, I was looking to make a Runescape Private Server and came across moparisthebest.com Which got me the v3.2 Web client, at first I thought I could make one simply there. No, I went to these forums and found this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
Very easy tutorial to follow. Very easy.
However, I got back to the Web client and found that it would not work, nothing happened. So I set the IP to the IP I set in the Port Forward steps and set the Port to the Port I set in the Port Forward steps. This time it told me the server had an error, and might be down.
I'm just wondering what am I doing wrong? Also, I am wondering if there is a debug file I need to run? Or perhaps a MySQL database?
I have worked with Private Servers before for a different game, so have experiences. But this is completely different than those.
Oh, and sorry for my English, I am still learning.

item.title: Executionable?
item.dc:creator: @kreysherd kreysherd
